Hello, got a quick question if anyone ha: there's no easy way for warty
on hoary you can simpy say apt-get install kde
One-line upgrade: sudo sed -e 's/warty/hoary/' -i /etc/apt/sources.list && sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get dist-upgrade
can you paste /etc/apt/sources.list on ubuntu.pastebin.com please
sorry for the newb question, i haven't used Ubuntu untill today... whats the command for opening /etc/apt/sources.list again?
open the file again with sudo gedit /etc/apt/sources.list
on line 5, 6, 15, 16, 18 and 19 (the lines that start with deb) you remove the # at the beginning
then save it and run sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get dist-upgrade
works great thank you for the help sir ^_^
